definitions.definition: A whirling or turning on the toes in dancing , primarily in ballet .
The whirling about of a horse .
A wooden mouthpiece assembly or lip rest used in some European double-reed instruments.

main_definition: A whirling or turning on the toes in dancing , primarily in ballet .
secondary_definitions: The whirling about of a horse .
A wooden mouthpiece assembly or lip rest used in some European double-reed instruments.
